Hi 1337patchy, welcome to the add-on community

Don't forget you'll need to supply a license with your add-on (when it's available) and the source code as well.

Also something like this has been attempted before, the Kessler mod is very similar to this.
Looks nice.

Hi 1337patchy, welcome to the add-on community

Don't forget you'll need to supply a license with your add-on (when it's available) and the source code as well.

Also something like this has been attempted before, the Kessler mod is very similar to this.

Hello there Thanks for the welcome. I have read the sticky and will comply I have found out about Kessler after the project had been started, when i saw Kessler i thought about cancelling my project, but then i thought, Why stopping? So me and Noob Levler started working on it, following the original concept we had in mind for Kermageddon. The goal is not to get people to stop using Kessler, but it is, instead, releasing a creation of ours, something WE made, and achieved on our own

Looks nice.

Thank you good sir
Me and my Derpy Cursor Are Waiting for a Voyager Labs Server, FINALLYYY THANK YOU.
Shall watch with interest ...
Thank you very much guys!! Hopefully, coding will continue today as usually

First off I'd like to thank everyone for their interest; knowing that people like what you are doing really helps accelerate the whole process .

Secondly a status update : patchy detected a slight problem with the save file merging last night, we're going to try to sort that out now.

We are thinking of releasing an alpha version soon (how soon I can not tell, depends on the depth of the problem and on any problem that might appear down the line).

Edited September 5, 2012 by NoobLevler

On a short notice: Re write the whole save / merging code.

Edited September 5, 2012 by 1337patchy

Hello there Thanks for the welcome. I have read the sticky and will comply I have found out about Kessler after the project had been started, when i saw Kessler i thought about cancelling my project, but then i thought, Why stopping? So me and Noob Levler started working on it, following the original concept we had in mind for Kermageddon. The goal is not to get people to stop using Kessler, but it is, instead, releasing a creation of ours, something WE made, and achieved on our own

Thank you good sir

Kessler isn't really supported or Updated so please don't cancel this project, I've been waiting forever for a new Multiplayer.

please don't cancel this project

We are not counting on that happening ^.^. Yesterday we had to rewrite the save/merge code, but it failed So today, we will do it again Then you can expect a community feedback alpha version to be released, when that goes ok ^.^

im gonna get it so i can join the voyger lab sever when sbowyer has it .

P.S sup sbowyer

I think you guys should know why the delay in updates. NoobLevler is in charge of the save / merge script, i am in charge of the rest of the script, the layout, the gui, the ftp script. NoobLevler already wrote the save/merge script around 5 times, it always gives problems when a ship is deleted, because it does not only delete the ship that was deleted before uploading, deletes the whole save, and i am sure no one wants that to happen So we are taking our time.

Update time :

-Initial merging is (as far as I can tell) done, as well as some preliminary tests to ensure everything is working according to plan(everything seems good so far );

-Started working on the final merging (we've already talked about a better way to do this final merger, our previous idea was flawed and more complicated than the one in practice now).

Should have the code done for patchy to incorporate it with the application itself in a couple of days tops(hopefully), now that I have figured a better and simpler way to delete and we've got a better plan to do the merging.

NoobLevler and 1337patchy I offer you guys to join Voyager labs as our TWO ranks specially made for you guys (Coder). I've come to like you guys alot and hope you take this offer seriously, No-one can become coders except you so its basicly a Custom Rank.

hey guys!! Another update time the part of the script which downloads and merges the two files works great already, just the part which merges them for upload which is left to tune

expect a community feedback alpha version soon :D

@Sbowyer28, Well we cant accept unless we know what we are talking about, and how much time will it consume, as school is starting ^.^ Can you describe what is the Voyager Labs, and what does the Coder rank consist of?

Voyager labs does orders for people who can build very well, The time, It depends on any order you'd like to take. A Coder basicly is like supervisor's They watch after the business if someone is gone like Vice CEO and CEO, Also a very unlikely chance of thiss but say i we ABSOLUTELY 100% Need something we will come to you for a Coding project, You dont have to accept but still, We may make a request but it is VERY unlikely. I Hope you take this seriously.

Thank you for the reply, i speak on my behalf only, but i can not accept mate, dont consider myself either a good builder, nor do i think i will have enough time to fullfill the requirements of the Coder rank! I am much thankful though, for your consideration, and i am sure you will find someone ideal for the job Keep tunned for Kermageddon pal! I hope you don't take me wrong but i think i would not perform the task correctly
No Problem I Undestand, School is definately rough and I understand school does take alot of time. Thanx for the reply.

Thanks a lot for the offer but right now I'm not in a position to make a good decision.

School is starting soon and that can take over most of the time, and I really don't want to accept anything just to find out I can't see it through.

Plus from what I've seen on your thread i really don't think I'm the ideal person to take such a job, so, unfortunately, I think I shall have to decline , as much as I would like to be part of such endeavor.
Sounds like a fun mod

Sounds like a fun mod

Sure hope you feel the same when its released
So Hows work going today on this?
mods take time o i mean addons take time ik how eager you are theres this crago bay mod I want i have to wait for it still waitin for it so. wait for it
As i write this, i am preparing to implement the 10039948882389th version of the pre upload save file merge code If it all works, you will have the community feedback alpha version soon
